title: An Act supporting and honoring Immigration and Customs Enforcement lawful detainments (SHIELD Act)

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Fattman, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1096) of Ryan C. Fattman, Alyson M. Sullivan-Almeida and Steven George Xiarhos for legislation to support and honor detention requests by the United States Immigration and Customs Enforcement.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/25/2025 from 10:00 AM-05:00 PM in A-2
